Articles.Content:
Okay... So I was blasting some stuff to bits with BDarmory mod and then i found out that some of the pieces of the rover I blasted had gone through the earth and into an underground ocean I was like "... how did this get to the ocean?:confused:" And then I realized it was underground. It's defiantly water it makes plashes. My dad calls it the "Underground River". Anyway what I was wanting to see is if anyone can make a boat and get it down there and move around. I really want to see your creations:D. I don't know if this is possible the only pieces I got through were just a 1x1 structural plate. But i did get two down there.

-------edit-------

I found out thats i bug for small things so nvm.

Edited March 5, 2015 by PSOliver
Nope, falling into the subterrian ocean is caused by a minor glitch last I checked, you can't get a complete ship down there. The most you can get is large sized debris.

It's defiantly water it makes plashes.

I am trying to parse what you are saying there.

It is "defiantly" water...

Definition of defiantly in English:

adverb

In a manner that shows open resistance or bold disobedience:

Ok, so we have very deliberately disobedient water, which is making the action of hitting water. So it is hitting... itself?

Sounds kinky!
Whoops sorry autocorrect and okay. that too bad I really wanted to get a boat down there.
